nodes.message: No greeting because she isn't in the scene.

nodes.text: Well, if it isn't the new kid in town... So who's your sponsor, Sweetie?
Hello, please let me introduce myself. I'm Shawn O'Conner and you must be the loveliest person here at the school. It's a pleasure to meet you.
You must be the person who knows everyone and everything that goes on around this school. I'm glad to meet you.
Why, if it isn't the university receptionist here in the reception room. What a coincidence! So what do they call you, Sugar?
I'm Sophia... Sophia Miranda. I like to keep informed with everything that goes on around here.
You looking for me, Kid?
Of course I came here to see you. It's the highlight of my day.
I dropped by to say hello and see if you could keep me up to date on anything interesting going on around here.
Well, knowing that this room is out of my way and that it's a dead end since I can't go outside, that's a reasonable assumption, yes.
Well, look what the Drat dragged in! Nice to see you up and around after you nearly got yourself expelled the hard way.
You owe me big time, Shawn. Big time. Don't you ever forget I saved your sorry aspiring rogue skin from certain death.
I like people who repay their debts.
Okay, Bardy Boy, are you the stinker who stole my favorite lipstick from my desk?
Hiya, Honeylips! So what's the word from you misfits about the Thief - How'd he get away with his crimes?
How's it going, Babe? You seem to be fitting in here just fine.
Going to someplace special for the Midterm Break, Red? Oh, I forgot - you aren't going nowhere.
Why, if it isn't the very person I wanted to see! Hello, Handsome.
Care to do a little favor for me?
What do you think, Cuddles, did your class rat abandon this sinking ship or did someone strangle him?
So I heard that the rat returned to this nest, only slightly the worse for wear. Funny, Honeypie, but I didn't see you as the hero type.
Ha - so the little sneak from your class met a sorry end. Why am I not surprised?
Ugh! I don't know how Sardonians stand all these ghosts running around! They give me the heeby-jeebies.
They don't pay me enough to put up with this crap. Ghosts were bad enough. Now there are Drats everywhere!
Hey, Sugar. I'll bet you can't wait for this semester to be over so you can finally escape this looneybin.
What's new with you, Gingersnap?
How's it going, Honey?
